Following are the complete names of the collectors in the VAIS project: Quintin Arias, Jesus Camacho, Ruben Cordero, Mauricio García, Grey Gustafson, L. J. Joly, Kelly B. Miller, Andrew E. Z. Short, William D. Shepard, Robert Sites, Monica Tellez, and Phil Torres.
Locality data for specimens from other collections are given verbatim in the species accounts, sometimes with very slight changes, such as punctuation, for clarity.
Some duplicate specimens from long series will be deposited in the MCZ.
